lines.text:
[On fiding a dead feline in the back of his student van]
What the hell is this dead cat doing here?

[Trying to reason with this President Nixon]
Relax! Just put your fuckin' mind at rest.... Are you nuts?

[Barking at Joe]
What's wrong with you? You just run that guy over!...
... You must have a very low IQ!

[Encountering the Nixon faced nutter wandaering along the deserted highways]
Get out of the road you fucking zombie!

[to Joe on encountering the Nixon faced nutter]
You better be careful, he looks like a big Mutha
Hey Joe, tell your Dad to eat shit!
